Package com.xhive.util.interfaces

This package contains a selection of tools for importing data from relational data sources, processing XML documents with XSLT and XSL:FO.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf Loads data from a character separated file.
XhiveExternalDataLoaderIf Parent interface of XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf and XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf.
XhiveFormatterIf Formats an XSL-FO document into other formats.
XhiveFtsTextHandlerIf Event handler for events fired by the getTextAndTerms method in the XhiveFtsUtil class.
XhiveFtsUtilIf Provider of convenience full text search processing methods.
XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf Load SQL data from a JDBC source into a document.
XhiveSqlLoaderIf Deprecated. Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf or XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf instead
XhiveTransformerIf Applies an XSLT transformation to a document.
 

Class Summary
ReaderInputStream A ReaderInputStream is a bridge from character streams to byte streams: It reads characters and encodes them into bytes using a specified charset.
WriterOutputStream A WriterOutputStream is a bridge from byte streams to character streams: It writes bytes and decodes them into characters using a specified charset.
 

Package com.xhive.util.interfaces Description

This package contains a selection of tools for importing data from relational data sources, processing XML documents with XSLT and XSL:FO.
